name: Will-O-Wisk
description:
Our Vimjam 2022 game entry!

**Disclaimer**

You might encounter a bug where your ingredients get stuck on the table. If it happens, try pushing it with by dragging another one over it.

***

Theme / Focus : Turn the heat up / Multi-use

Whisk the wisp around the room to heat up the different stations! Make as many points as you can until the timer runs out!

Controls :

Use your mouse to drag the ingredient, click to move the wisp and brew your potions.

Credits :

Everything was made by us during the Jam.

Programming & Art : Moehito

Music & SFX : Adagio

Game Design : Both!
